definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: Gaze past the people , you will perceive truth.
sentences.chinese: 你深入细察人民，就能发现真理。

sentences.english: A closer look at China is important, because it's an extraordinary case.
sentences.chinese: 细察中国很重要，因为它是一个非同寻常的例子。

definition: to visit/to go to see what's going on
to observe and form a judgment
to study/to examine/to probe/to study the underlying principles
fine hair grown by animals (or down grown by birds) in the fall/(fig.) sth barely discernible/the slightest thing/the minutest detail
the whys and the wherefores/the detailed story/root cause
to rummage/to look through/to leaf through
to speculate/to surmise/to wonder whether/to guess
